name: crack-o-date
description: A daily math puzzle web application where users create equations using the digits from today's date

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=client && npm run test --workspace=server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=client && npm install --workspace=server
scripts.deploy:gcp: npm run build && gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml
scripts.deploy:aws: npm run build && aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin [ACCOUNT].dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=client && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=client && npm run format --workspace=server

author: Damon
